snippet.title: Reworked Trophy Lodge Update Trailer | Virtual Hunter
snippet.description:
Welcome to the new and reworked trophy lodge hunters! In the lodge you can find a cozy living room, bedrooms and the showroom above the cliff to showcase your best trophies. You can freely place your taxidermied trophies and make it your dream lodge. Hone your aim at the range and archery skills at the reworked 3D bow course. 

Important! Your current trophies will be safe but you need to place them again to the new lodge since this is a totally new building.

Get the game from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1549850/Virtual_Hunter

Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/gGmSAA8Prd
Follow us on Facebook: https://bit.ly/3DDP0QV
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/VirtualHunterVR
Website: http://virtualhuntervr.com
 #virtualhuntervr #vrgamesreview #virtualreality  #vrgaming #vrgames #gaming #indiegame #hunting  #huntinggame #gameplay #games
